Turning to competition, Eric Schmidt said he was perplexed by the Facebook obsession because the facts don't support it. "[ Facebook] has clearly stated they don't want to get into the search business. Facebook users tend to use Google search. Facebook's ads business does not displace our advertising."

a particular group. A group that has been hit harder by the recession than most. Veterans. A U.S. Senator was there to urge new steps to make sure they can find work. For the men and women who, literally, risking their lives, giving everything of themselves to defend our country and our freedom, I think going that extra mile really does matter and I think we should, said Senator Kirsten Gillibrand . media is reporting that American midfielder Michael Vick Bradley is on the verge of a move from Borussia Moenchengladbach to Turkey's Galatasaray. Borussia director Max Eberl said Friday: There is an offer for him which the club could live with and which is acceptable. Now it's up to Michael Vick to sort his things out and reach an agreement with the club.
